00018 /*
00019  * sampler.h
00020  *
00021  * The sampling function which samples the
00022  * new topic assignment using the collapsed
00023  * Gibbs Sampler approach. It takes in the
00024  * topic counts for the current word, the
00025  * local topic counts for the document being
00026  * processed and Abar, Bbar & Ccached
00027  *
00028  * The procedure is simple. It computes C(t)
00029  * and Cbar. It then generates a
00030  * random number using the uniform RNG passed
00031  * in. It scales the number by Abar + Bbar + Cbar
00032  * It checks to which probability mass the number
00033  * generated belongs. Based on that samples the
00034  * topic responsible for generating this number
00035  *
00036  *  Created on: 24 Apr, 2009
00037  *      
00038  */
00039 
00040 #ifndef SAMPLER_H_
00041 #define SAMPLER_H_
00042 
00043 #include "constants.h"
00044 #include <boost/random/variate_generator.hpp>
00045 #include <boost/random/uniform_real.hpp>
00046 #include "tbb/atomic.h"
00047 #include "TopicCounts.h"
00048 
00049 using namespace boost;
00050 using namespace tbb;
00051 namespace sampler {
00052 
00053 topic_t
00054         sample(
00055                 const topicCounts* currentTypeTopicCounts,
00056                 const topic_t old_topic,
00057                 const atomic<topic_t>* tokens_per_topic,
00058                 const topic_t* loca_topic_counts,
00059                 const topic_t* loca_topic_index,
00060                 const int& non_zero_topics,
00061                 const double& smoothingOnlyMass,
00062                 const double& topicBetaMass,
00063                 const double* cachedCoefficients,
00064                 const double& betaSum,
00065                 const double* alpha,
00066                 double* topic_term_scores,
00067                 const topic_t& numTopics,
00068                 variate_generator<base_generator_type&, boost::uniform_real<> >* unif01);
00069 
00070 } // namespace sampler
00071 #endif /* SAMPLER_H_ */
